title: (x) "Before the Sun Rises" book cover - Troover (Trooper) {Lex}

comments.content:
I think it’s [Troover](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929040419/http:/www.paratype.com/pstore/fonts/Troover.htm) from ParaType.
